Variable Examples_key2: Think of an example where something is changing in real life.
Variable Examples_key4: When you play a game your score got changes throughout the time you play the game.
Variable Examples_key5: Imagine, you have your birthday today. You buy a box of chocolate which have 100 chocolates in it. You go to your school and distribute them in everyone. You have 30 students in your class and 50 staff members in your school. Now, how much chocolate do you have?
